Scripts.OnLoad: self:SetAllPoints(GuildMicroButton) self:RegisterEvent("GUILD_ROSTER_UPDATE") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_SYSTEM") self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_ENTERING_WORLD") self.friendon = gsub(gsub(ERR_FRIEND_ONLINE_SS,"[%^%$%(%)%%%.%[%]%*%+%-%?]","%%%1"),"%%%%s",".+") self.friendoff = gsub(gsub(ERR_FRIEND_OFFLINE_S,"[%^%$%(%)%%%.%[%]%*%+%-%?]","%%%1"),"%%%%s",".+") self.mergebug = gsub(gsub(ERR_CHAT_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND_S, "[%^%$%(%)%%%.%[%]%*%+%-%?]","%%%1"),"%%%%s",".+")
Scripts.OnEvent: if (event == "CHAT_MSG_SYSTEM") then local system_msg = ... if ((strmatch(system_msg, self.friendon) ~= system_msg) and (strmatch(system_msg, self.friendoff) ~= system_msg) and (strmatch(system_msg, self.mergebug) ~= system_msg)) then return end GuildRoster() C_Timer.After(11, C_GuildInfo.GuildRoster) elseif (event == "PLAYER_ENTERING_WORLD") then C_Timer.After(10.5, C_GuildInfo.GuildRoster) end GuildMicroButtonOnlineCountNumber:SetText(tostring(select(3,GetNumGuildMembers())))
Scripts.OnUpdate: if (false) then self.updatedelay = self.updatedelay - elapsed; if (0 >= self.updatedelay) then C_GuildInfo.GuildRoster() self.updatedelay = nil end end
